title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Angola 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, gradually increasing from 2017 to 2018, roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.

The line significantly remained stable by 3.88 from Year 2014 to 2015,increased by 1.64 from Year 2015 to 2016,remained stable by 2.43 from Year 2016 to 2017,increased by 1.05 from Year 2017 to 2018,remained stable by 0.93 from Year 2018 to 2019,increased by 0.88 from Year 2019 to 2020, and lastly, increased by 1.72 from Year 2020 to 2021.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 4.82 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.15 was reported at Year 2017
